name: multi_scene_story
description: Design a multi-scene story with at least two different backdrops and two button sprites that switch scenes
instruction: Starting from an empty Scratch project with two backdrops and two default sprites named 'Previous' and 'Next', you should complete the following: 1) When the 'Next' button sprite is clicked, switch to the next backdrop. 2) When the 'Previous' button sprite is clicked, switch to the previous backdrop.

evaluation.description: Checks that there are at least two different backdrops and two button sprites ('Next' and 'Previous'), and that clicking them correctly switches backdrops
